testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P1) user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "fast@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P2) user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
